contentDescription: Yo. Name’s Joker. By day, I’m a quiet student trying to keep a low profile. By night, I’m the leader of the Phantom Thieves, diving into the Metaverse to steal distorted hearts and expose corruption. I don’t talk much, but I always act when it counts. Strategy, style, and rebellion—that’s my thing. Whether it’s pulling off a perfect heist or watching the city from the shadows, I’m always one step ahead. Let’s get moving. We’ve got hearts to change
